text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump 1. Bullshit
2. In February Donald Trump denied Coronavirus was an issue and just a Democrat hoax & cases would go to zero in a week.
3. He then proceeded to hold rallies & play golf.
4. The US NEVER had the most expansive/accurate testing system. Period.
5. Nice try.
#LiarInChief https://t.co/cNwuLc1BEJ
